data.text: @malar0ne I’m so grateful that @Stanford is requiring Covid vaccination! Yay!! https://t.co/OtAQYBrszB
@malar0ne You literally posted an image that says faculty members don’t have to disclose their vaccination status. Are students being afforded that same right? DOUBLE STANDARD
@malar0ne Good. Don't let them take the easy out. Make them jump through all the hoops.
@Why_was_it_fun This is the same as the guidelines for students. https://t.co/FdiXtHf6pP
@malar0ne Awesome double standard: let the faculty (who are more at-risk) opt-out through regular testing, but make students submit to the vaccine.
